transforms.code:
FirstName = self.view.custom.firstName
	LastName = self.view.custom.lastName
	AgeAbove = self.view.custom.ageAbove
	AgeBelow = self.view.custom.ageBelow
	UseGender = self.view.custom.useGender
	UseRace = self.view.custom.useRace
	UseHumanId = self.view.custom.useHumanId
	#tableData is the data object to return
	tableData = []
	RowId = 0
	
	if FirstName != "" or LastName != "" or AgeAbove != 0 or AgeBelow != 120 or UseGender == 1 or UseRace == 1 or UseHumanId == 1:
		#Iterate over the results of the query
		for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
			rowStructure = {}
			rowData = {}
			style = {}
			rowData['rowId'] = RowId
			rowData['humanId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "id")
			rowData['firstName'] = value.getValueAt(row, "firstName")
			rowData['lastName'] = value.getValueAt(row, "lastName")
			rowData['phone'] = value.getValueAt(row, "phone")
			rowData['email'] = value.getValueAt(row, "email")
			rowData['dob'] = value.getValueAt(row, "dob")
			rowData['age'] = value.getValueAt(row, "age")
			rowData['volunteerId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "volunteerId")
			
			#Set the default style for the row
			style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Detail"
			rowStructure['value'] = rowData
			rowStructure['style'] = style
			#Append the individual's rowData to the tableData object
			tableData.append(rowStructure)
			RowId += 1
	
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = -1
	self.view.custom.priorSelected = []
	self.props.selection.data = []
	self.view.custom.selectAll = 0
	
	return tableData

messageHandlers.script:
### Refresh data
	system.perspective.print("Refresh Volunteer Search")
	self.refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = None

transforms.code:
FirstName = self.view.custom.firstName
	LastName = self.view.custom.lastName

	#tableData is the data object to return
	tableData = []
	RowId = 0
	
	if FirstName != "" or LastName != "":
		#Iterate over the results of the query
		for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
			rowStructure = {}
			rowData = {}
			style = {}
			rowData['rowId'] = RowId
			rowData['id'] = value.getValueAt(row, "id")
			rowData['name'] = value.getValueAt(row, "name")
			rowData['description'] = value.getValueAt(row, "description")
			rowData['leader'] = value.getValueAt(row, "leader")
			rowData['member_count'] = value.getValueAt(row, "Member Count")
			
			#Set the default style for the row
			style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Detail"
			rowStructure['value'] = rowData
			rowStructure['style'] = style
			#Append the individual's rowData to the tableData object
			tableData.append(rowStructure)
			RowId += 1
	
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = -1
	self.view.custom.priorSelected = []
	self.props.selection.data = []
	self.view.custom.selectAll = 0
	
	return tableData

messageHandlers.script:
### Refresh data
	system.perspective.print("Refresh Group Search")
	self.refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = None

# Reset search parameters
	system.perspective.print("Resetting Volunteer List Generation Search Parameters")
	self.getChild("Personal").getChild("Left").getChild("FirstName").props.params.text = ""
	self.getChild("Personal").getChild("Center").getChild("LastName").props.params.text = ""
	self.view.custom.useHumanId = False
	self.view.custom.humanId = ""
	
	# Refresh the data results
	system.perspective.print("Refresh Volunteer Search")
	Table = self.getChild("Table")
	Table.refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.view.custom.selectAll = 0
	Table.props.selection.selectedRow = None

TableProps = self.getChild("Table").props
	if TableProps.data:
		self.view.custom.selectAll = 1
		self.getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow = 0
		newSelected = []
		SelectAll = []
		system.perspective.print('Select All')
		for Row in range(len(TableProps.data)):
			TableProps.data[Row].style.classes = 'Table/Row_Select_Detail'
			SelectAll.append(TableProps.data[Row].value)
			newSelected.append(Row)
		
		self.view.custom.all = SelectAll
		self.view.custom.priorSelected = newSelected

TableProps = self.getChild("Table").props
	TableProps.selection.selectedRow = None
	self.view.custom.priorSelected = []
	self.view.custom.all = []
	self.view.custom.selectAll = 0
	for Row in range(len(TableProps.data)):
		TableProps.data[Row].style.classes = 'Table/Cell_Detail'

self.view.custom.useHumanId = True
	self.view.custom.humanId = payload["humanId"]
	self.getChild("Personal").getChild("Left").getChild("FirstName").props.params.text = ""
	self.getChild("Personal").getChild("Center").getChild("LastName").props.params.text = ""
	Table = self.getChild("Table")
	Table.refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.view.custom.selectAll = 0
	Table.props.selection.selectedRow = None

import traceback
	try:
		self.getSibling("Volunteers").props.params.first_name = ''
		self.getSibling("Volunteers").props.params.last_name = ''
		self.getSibling("Groups").props.params.name = ''
		#self.getSibling("EmbedRow3").props.params.race_id = None
		#self.getSibling("EmbedRow3").props.params.ssn = ''
		#self.getSibling("EmbedRow3").props.params.dob_year = None
		#self.getSibling("EmbedRow3").props.params.dob_month = None
		#self.getSibling("EmbedRow3").props.params.dob_day = None
		#self.view.params.output_id = -1
		self.view.params.output_VG = ''
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participant_Search ResetVolunteerGroupSearch OnChange")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
	#if({value} = -1,'New Note: ' + {view.params.SelectVolunteerOrGroup},'Edit Note: ' + {view.custom.SelectVolunteerOrGroup})
